Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.core Description

Contains the base implementation for core widgets.

Client UI Base Widget Core

This package contains the base implementation of net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.core. All implementations of that API should extend the base classes provided here.
